--part1_22.10763828.27914ebf_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Red Bolt sits, recalling what he has seen. He stands, unfolds his wings, 
jumps off the cliff, and begins flying towards the distant neutral base. 
Suddenly, his wing begins to short out, and he falls to the ground. Red Bolt 
discovers his right arm 50 feet away. He activates his computer, and starts 
shouting over the airwaves: "Someone respond, I'm critically injured, someone 
respond!"

--part1_22.10763828.27914ebf_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
